kb3.name: kb3_standings
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_standings` ( `sta_from` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `sta_to` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `sta_from_type` enum('a','c') NOT NULL default 'a', `sta_to_type` enum('a','c') NOT NULL default 'a', `sta_value` float NOT NULL default '0', `sta_comment` char(200) NOT NULL, KEY `sta_from` (`sta_from`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
